amendment.description: To provide for implementation of an order pending appeal.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3932 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3932 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S536) To provide for implementation of an order pending appeal.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3932 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3932 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3911.
